summary: Unveiling the Tale of Pepe - Step into the whimsical world of Pepe Lore, where the iconic Pepe the Frog transcends static images to embark on animated adventures that captivate hearts and minds. Born from the imaginative genius of Matt Furie, the creator of Pepe the Frog, this project is a homage to the beloved internet character's evolution into dynamic, narrative-rich animations.
